title: ResumAI - AI powered ATS
summary: Modern Applicant Tracking System with AI-powered resume analysis, intelligent candidate matching, and role-based dashboards for applicants and recruiters.

title: Flight Delay Prediction at Scale with PySpark on Google Cloud
summary: Built and deployed a scalable pipeline to predict airline departure delays using 65M+ records, PySpark, RandomForest, and cloud infrastructure; includes full preprocessing, modeling, and analysis.

title: Research Paper - Comparative Analysis of Crude Oil Price Prediction Using SVM, ANN and GARCH-GED
summary: Comparative study evaluating SVM, ANN, and GARCH-GED models for forecasting volatile crude oil prices using WTI dataset, published in Springer ICICC 2022.

title: LLM Inference Workload Optimization
summary: Optimizing model inference using batching, quantization, or model distillation techniques.

title: Exploring ML Models while predicting stock prices
summary: Comprehensive journey through classical machine learning algorithms applied to financial prediction, covering 10+ models from kNN to ensemble methods with trading strategy implementation.

title: C(ART) - Fullstack Ecommerce Website
summary: Comprehensive MERN stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product management, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

title: American Sign Language Interpreter
summary: Real-time hand gesture interpreter converting ASL to text/speech via computer vision.

title: Automobile Price Prediction
summary: Machine learning models to predict automobile prices using 1985 dataset with 29 features, achieving RMSE of $2,343 with Gradient Boosting.

title: Stroke Prediction
summary: Health analytics model predicting stroke likelihood from patient data.

title: Mumbai House Price Prediction
summary: Machine learning model predicting Mumbai real estate prices using 6,347 properties with 19 features, achieving RMSE of 0.0196 with Random Forest.

title: Ant Colony Optimization (ACO)
summary: Solved pathfinding or scheduling problems using the ACO metaheuristic algorithm.

title: ETL using Apache Airflow
summary: Scheduled and automated data ingestion, transformation, and loading to a data warehouse.

title: Orion - Virtual Assistant
summary: Python-based voice-controlled personal assistant with speech recognition, text-to-speech, and AI integration.

title: All In Casino
summary: Multiplayer digital casino with games like poker and blackjack, possibly AI opponents.

title: Budget Tracker - Personal Finance Management
summary: Comprehensive desktop application for personal finance management with user authentication, budget tracking, expense management, and data visualization using Python, Tkinter, and SQLite.
